options.None: have no graph in the viewport
options.Dropdown Menu: Network -> Demo -> Demo #: lay out an unweighted network graph from Demo #1
lay out a weighted network graph from Demo #2
lay out an unweighted network graph from Demo #3
lay out a weighted network graph from Demo #4
options.Dropdown Menu: Network -> Open File: lay out a network graph from the Excel, SIF, or GraphML network if there are no errors in the file
options.Dropdwon Menu: Network -> Load From Data: lay out a network graph from the given genes added from the specified database source
options.Dropdown Menu: Demo -> Demo #1: lay out an unweighted network graph from Demo #1
options.Dropdown Menu: Demo -> Demo #2: lay out a weighted network graph from Demo #2
options.Dropdown Menu: Demo -> Demo #3: lay out an unweighted network graph from Demo #3
options.Dropdown Menu: Demo -> Demo #4: lay out a weighted network graph from Demo #4
options.Sidebar Menu: Network -> Demo -> Demo #1: lay out an unweighted network graph from Demo #1
options.Sidebar Menu: Network -> Demo -> Demo #2: lay out a weighted network graph from Demo #2
options.Sidebar Menu: Network -> Demo -> Demo #3: lay out an unweighted network graph from Demo #3
options.Sidebar Menu: Network -> Demo -> Demo #4: lay out a weighted network graph from Demo #4
options.Sidebar Menu: Network -> Open File: lay out a network graph from the Excel, SIF, or GraphML network if there are no errors in the file
options.Sidebar Menu: Network -> Load From Datab: lay out a network graph from the given genes added from the specified database source

options.Dropdown Menu: Network -> Reload: center, zoom to 100%, and reapply the force graph parameters
options.Sidebar Menu: Network -> Reload: center, zoom to 100%, and reapply the force graph parameters

options.Select \"To Unweighted SIF\": export an unweighted SIF file from the graph currently loaded
options.Select \"To Weighted SIF\": export a weighted SIF file from the graph currently loaded
options.Select \"To Unweighted GraphML\": export an unweighted GraphML file from the graph currently loaded
options.Select \"To Weighted GraphML\": export a weighted GraphML file from the graph currently loaded
options.Select \"To Excel\": export an Excel file from the graph currently loaded with the chosen data

options.Select \"To PNG\": export a PNG image from the graph currently loaded
options.Select \"To SVG\": export a SVG image from the graph currently loaded
options.Select \"To PDF\": export a PDF file from the graph currently loaded
